variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: Non-enumerated value domain. Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: Marshfield Clinic=16; Vanderbilt University=27; Group Health Cooperative=38; Mayo Clinic=49; Northwestern University=52 External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2181644 (Public ID)

variable.name: Type_1_Diabetes
variable.comment: At time of enrollment - NOTE: Possible is not part of the caDSR data element. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2239985 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: Type_2_Diabetes
variable.comment: Indication could be from a diagnosis code, medications, or lab values. Y=yes; P=possible; N=no (T2D control); U=uncertain or otherwise excluded as a case or a control; not enough information - NOTE: Possible is not part of the caDSR data element. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2635744 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: dyslipidemia
variable.description: Total cholesterol >= 200 OR Triglycerides >= 150 OR HDL cholesterol <= 40 OR 'C49488=Yes' (taking) lipid lowering medications
